title: Final Post-Merge Sanity Check
description: Validates that all worktrees have been properly merged into main and the unified Kanban system is fully operational with all recursive features working.
userStories: As a developer, I want to confirm all feature branches are unified in main.
As a user, I want to verify the Planning tab loads all task cards correctly.
As an agent, I want to test that Claude sessions launch successfully from task cards.
successCriteria: All 5 feature branches are merged into main
App builds successfully with pnpm build
ENABLE_KANBAN=true pnpm dev shows Planning tab
All 17+ task cards are visible in Planning tab
Launch Claude button opens sessions successfully
End-to-end tests pass with pnpm test:e2e
Adaptive planning task shells resolve properly
validationSteps: Delete/archive old worktrees with git worktree remove
Navigate to Planning tab and verify all tasks load
Test Claude session launch from a task card
Run pnpm test:e2e to validate system integrity
